name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Accomplished Senior Engineer with extensive expertise in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular** for delivering scalable, reliable applications. Proven track record in designing user-centric solutions that enhance performance and user experience. Experienced in implementing complex systems across diverse sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, achieving up to 30% efficiency improvements through automation and robust architecture. Committed to maintaining high standards of clean, efficient code and fostering team collaboration.

experience.responsibilities:
• Led the design of a **microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS)** utilizing **Java (Spring Boot)**, achieving **95% accuracy** in patient tracking and boosting adherence rates through automated reminders.
• Developed **RESTful APIs** using **Spring Data JPA**, enhancing data accuracy by **40%** and ensuring secure EHR integration with **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
• Improved user experience of the pathway builder by implementing **React** and **Ant Design**, cutting completion time by **30%**.
• Engineered a notification system with **RabbitMQ**, resulting in **99% timely alert delivery**.
• Established CI/CD pipelines leveraging **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, achieving a **80% reduction** in deployment times.
• Containerized microservices using **Docker**, optimizing deployment processes across staging and production environments.
• Managed cloud services on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)** with **Terraform**, maintaining **99.9% uptime** and enhancing load handling with **Redis caching**.

• Developed backend services using **Java (Spring Boot)** and **Node.js**, reducing response times for ticketing and customer support by **25%**.
• Designed a notification system with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
• Created a customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, improving resolution rates by **20%**.
• Automated testing and deployment with **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent release process.
• Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** with **Docker** and **Terraform**, cutting infrastructure setup time by **50%**.

• Developed and maintained backend REST APIs utilizing **Java (Spring Boot)**, **Hibernate**, and **PostgreSQL**, achieving an impressive **98% uptime**.
• Spearheaded frontend development using **Angular**, leading to a **40% improvement** in load times.
• Conducted comprehensive testing using **JUnit** and **Mockito**, resulting in a **30% reduction** in bugs.
• Enhanced frontend performance by implementing lazy loading techniques and code splitting strategies, resulting in substantially faster load times.
• Deployed scalable solutions globally leveraging **AWS CloudFront** and **S3**, ensuring **low-latency access** for end-users.

skills:
Programming Languages: Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

	Backend Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

	Frontend Frameworks: React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

	DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline

	Cloud & Infrastructure: AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

	Other: Microservices, RESTful API design, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies
